ygData.subject: Re: Quest Fix!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, the quest is fixed, but, unfortunately, Tobon Starpyre does not give out a follow up quest.  So much for that theory.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, the quest is fixed, but, unfortunately, Tobon Starpyre does not give
out a follow up quest. So much for that theory.

At 08:34 PM 07/27/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>Hiya guys,
>
>The quest is fixed (I think). The lense quest appears to be working
>again. You can ask both of the observers who before told us to come back
>or we weren't experienced. I now have the three lenses. Also, if you go
>to Trudon (sp) he will tell you his brother (Bidl) is in Kelethin at
>nights in a tavern, and wandering around during the day. I haven't found
>Bidl yet, but am hangin out in Kelethin looking for him! Let me know if
>you find him, and where. I also suspect that Trudon could have been
>wrong, and meant Kaladim, since that is where Bidl was on the test
>server. Let me know what you guys find, I'll be looking tonite.
>
>Xalastile
>Lvl 22 Magician
>Xegony
